title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 4.4 - Restrictions on class DJ and MJ learner permit operation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 4.4 - Restrictions on class DJ and MJ learner permit operation

State Regulations
(a) New York City. A class DJ or MJ learner permit holder may not operate a motor vehicle in New

York City except that the holder of such permit may operate a motor vehicle
within New York City from 5 a.m. to 9 p.m. when such person is under the
supervision and control of a driver education teacher or driving school
instructor and such vehicle is equipped with dual controls. (b) Nassau and Suffolk Counties. A class DJ
or MJ learner permit holder may not operate a motor vehicle in the counties of

Nassau and Suffolk except that the holder of such permit may operate a motor
vehicle in Nassau and Suffolk counties from 5 a.m. to 9 p.m. when accompanied
by a licensed parent, guardian or one in a position of loco parentis, driver
education teacher or driving school instructor. (c) In all other areas of the state except
the Counties of Suffolk and Nassau or the City of New York. A class DJ or MJ
learner permit holder may operate a motor vehicle: (1)
from 5 a.m. to 9 p.m. under the immediate
supervision and control of a person at least 18 years of age who holds a
license valid in this State for the operation of the type of vehicle for which
the learner permit holder has made application to obtain; (2)
from 9 p.m. to 5 a.m. only when
accompanied by a licensed parent, guardian, person in loco parentis, driver
education teacher or driving school instructor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง
4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
